channel.title: *FIXED* Mod lock Please
channel.description:
[s]Ok so when a person reports someone on my server, I want all online Moderators to be notified. I know how to do that, but where do I find the report abuse button details in the files to edit it? cause to make it say to mods i know i just put below it
modyell("+playername+ has reported ------ < also how do i make it the persons name who was reported.")[/s]
*FIXED*
Mod lock please.
